attributes.action: The right for U.K Citizens to have access to Organic Medical Cannabis
attributes.additional_details:
Calling on the U.K Government to allow U.K Citizens to purchase Organic Medical Cannabis from a Licensed and Regulated out-let or U.S style "Dispensary".
Allow Patients to choose their own form of Cannabis Medicine that best suits their ailment(s).
License and Regulate Commercial Medical "Grows".
Allow Personal growing of 4 Mature plants and 8 immature plants per patient.
Allow Maximum Personal Medicine allowance of 5oz (dry) per month.
And finally to stop the prosecution of Medical Cannabis users
